message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. I think it's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  $200 is a bit outside my budget for this product. I'm really interested, but I'm only able to offer $80 right now. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer of $80. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. It's still a great deal considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
